meanings.sent1: The baddies in the movie were always causing trouble.
meanings.sent2: The police caught the baddies after a long chase.
meanings.sent3: The baddies in the story were always up to mischief.
meanings.sent4: The baddies in the game seemed unbeatable, like real-life villains.

meanings.definition: Something that is bad or undesirable.
meanings.sent1: The spoiled food in the fridge turned into baddies.
meanings.sent2: Avoiding sugary snacks is important to stay away from baddies.
meanings.sent3: The baddies in the garden were the weeds that kept growing back.
meanings.sent4: Negativity can sometimes be the silent baddies in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The baddies of procrastination can delay success if not tackled.
